actions.text: On agreeing to the Ribble amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 236 (Roll no. 588).

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment sought to give States the option of increasing the truck weight limits on their Interstate Highways from 80,000 pounds to 91,000 pounds if the trucks are equipped with an additional sixth axle. Amendment would not have impacted existing exemptions already enacted under the law.
